title: Update README
body:
Things to update

- Each task as it is closed
- Add contributors list to README

title: Add validations to attributes
body:
Cross check all the available attributes and see which is missing a validation.

Here's a link:
https://sailsjs.com/documentation/concepts/models-and-orm/validations#validations

You can also add a new snippet for `email` attributes, It can look like this: [`sattre`, `sae`]

Should be fun right?

title: Change 'default' to 'defaultsTo'
body:
Locate [`sinput`, `si`], then change:
> default

To:
> defaultsTo

title: Create snippets for associations
body:
You can head over to the Sails docs to see how associations work, then follow the pattern as others to see how you can create a snippet for associations

Here's a link:
https://sailsjs.com/documentation/concepts/models-and-orm/associations

Feel free to work on as many associations as you can
